parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Actual size of the text value

rule_function.message: The value should be one of this {list}

system_object_types.description: Checks that the value of the field is identical to one of the values in the list retured by a query

system_object_types.title: Add auto generated ID to all objects
system_object_types.description: Add auto generated ID (e.g. GUID) to all objects including object types. Use ID in link association types

system_object_types.description: Account

Free plan

system_object_types.name: sub_task
system_object_types.description: Sub-task

system_object_types.name: todo_list
system_object_types.description: List of to-do items

system_object_types.name: todo_item
system_object_types.description: To-Do item

system_object_types.title: Add Icon as a system object attribute
system_object_types.description: Icon would be used to graphically represent all object types and their instances

system_object_types.title: Add Display text as a system object attribute
system_object_types.description: Display text would be used as a default textual representation of objects

system_object_types.title: Add support for default visualisations of a single object
system_object_types.description: The visualisation should support display, create and edit modes

system_object_types.title: Add support for default visualisation of a list of objects  as a Table
system_object_types.description: It should be possible to configure object properties displayed

system_object_types.title: Add support for default visualisation of a list of objects as a Grid of cards
system_object_types.description: It should be possible to configure main and secondary fields of a card

system_object_types.title: Add support for default visualisation of a list of objects as a List
system_object_types.description: It should be possible to configure primary object property and secondary properties to display

system_object_types.title: Add support for read-only object properties
system_object_types.description: All visualisations that support edit mode should prevent changes of read-only object properties

system_object_types.title: Add support for calculated object properties
system_object_types.description: It should be possible to calculate object property using Javascript based expressions

system_object_types.title: Add support for object type configuration fields
system_object_types.description: Configuration fields that would be used when configuring system object as data type for an attribute e.g. precision for decimals, datetime, time etc., units for weight, dimension, volume, length, distance etc.

system_object_types.title: Add support unit conversion configuration with from/to calculation expressions
system_object_types.description: Use base unit for the rest of the conversion expressions e.g. cm can be aprimary/ base unit for length, so all conversion expressions would convert from and to base unit from other secondary units

system_object_types.title: Object types must provide default visualisations (components) for viewing/edit/create/quick create etc.
system_object_types.description: This visualisations will be used at run-time while rendering attributes of type of these object types

system_object_types.title: Support for Validation rules execution on client and server sides
system_object_types.description: Consider having a set of Data validation rules per command

system_object_types.title: Allow for object type single inheritance
system_object_types.description: Object type can extend other object type and inherit all base object type fields. If the sub type defund a field with the sane name as the field that already exists in the immediate base type, the base type field will be superseded by the sub type field
Pressing help icon would display Description for a particular attribute
system_object_types.title: Add support for contextual help
Add support for data table column resizing
Add support for data table multi-column ordering
Add support for hierarchy object types
Add support for multi-dimensional variation schema of object properties
system_object_types.description: This would allow adding multiple attribute values (primitive or objects) for the same attribute e.g. units (where conversion does not work), languages, currencies, channels etc.

system_object_types.title: Add support for visualisation widgets (components)
system_object_types.description: Data model will be separated from its visualisation. Visualisation will be represented as data model (metadata)

system_object_types.title: Add support for Large text data type
system_object_types.description: Large text would be rendered in Text area

system_object_types.title: Add support for data pivoting
Add support for calculated suggested attribute value
system_object_types.description: Suggested attribute value will be calculated with expressions and can be overwritten by user

system_object_types.title: Add support for multiple environments (sandboxes)
system_object_types.description: Each environments is a branch of master/production environment e.g. Development, QA, Pre-production, Production etc. Allow copying object types and data between downstream of environments i.e. Production to Preproduction to QA to Development. Allow publishing object types upstream of environments i.e. Development to QA to Preproduction to Production etc.

system_object_types.title: Add support for server side pagination to be used by API, list and grid vies etc.
Implement a repository pattern on the server side
Add support for multiple application visualisation perspectives
system_object_types.description: One or more roles would have access to a perspective. One role may have access to multiple perspectives

system_object_types.title: Add support for cloning applications
system_object_types.description: All application design objects (e.g. object types, pages, roles etc.) would be cloned to create a new application

system_object_types.title: Add support for extending application with extensions (plugins)
Add support for actions (triggers) and commands with workflows
system_object_types.description: Add support for expressing workflows in natural language (e.g. Gherkin). Consider Scheduled tasks as one of the triggers for workflows

system_object_types.title: Add support for Events, notification queues and notification handlers
system_object_types.description: This should follow Event Driven Architecture (EDA) principles. Allow setting web hooks as per event notification handlers

system_object_types.title: Add support for Integration with external services
system_object_types.description: Possible integrations would be SMS, email, notification, social media, payment gateways etc. via Zapier Integration or other options

system_object_types.title: Add support for look&feel customisations with themes
system_object_types.description: Add support for creation of own styles without any knowledge of CSS

system_object_types.title: Add support for loading objects from custom Web API URI
system_object_types.description: Consider object/request/response mapping

system_object_types.title: Add support for exporting visualisation as embed scripts e.g. iFrame
Add support for Object life cycle
system_object_types.description: States and state transitions with associated actions and access control

system_object_types.title: Add support for user UI based authentication
system_object_types.description: Add support for self-registration and email validation, password reset, and user profile updates

system_object_types.title: Add support for API authentication (basic, token etc.)
Add support for user UI access control (i.e. authorisation)
Add support for API access control (i.e. authorisation)
Add support for logging and monitoring
Add support for enabling auditing at object type/object property levels
Add support for search indexing and faceted search e.g. Elasticsearch
Add support for API documentation generation
Add support for Internationalisation
system_object_types.description:
UI and documentation Internationalisation i.e. multilingual support, localisation etc.

Localisation for account/application/tenant level with configurable time zone, date and time, and number and currency formats.

Add support for UTF-8 compatibility to store double byte characters such as Chinese, Arabic, etc.

system_object_types.title: Add support for Data import/export
system_object_types.description:
Data import and export engine that would move data in or out of the systemand your any cloud storage service (such as Dropbox, Google Drive, Microsoft OneDrive, Box, Amazon S3) or a web based repository (such as FTP, SFTP, HTTP, etc.). Data transfers can be scheduled to run automatically.

Add support for incremental data updates

system_object_types.title: Add support for Drag-able  accordion groups to reorder array objects e.g. Fields
Add support for parent-child visualisation
Add support for Responsive table
system_object_types.description: Table  columns would get hidden from the right to left as the screen size reduces

system_object_types.title: Add support for custom Edit forms
system_object_types.description: Users should be able to customise form layout (e.g. rows, columns, tabs, containers etc.)

system_object_types.title: Add support for Edit form (child view) along side the parent Table
Add support for hiding/unhiding table columns
Add support for data filtering with 'smart' queries
Add UI notifications e.g. Success/Error as messages that slide in and out from the bottom or the top of the screen
Add progress indicators for grids and firms while they are loading

system_object_types.name: large_string
system_object_types.description: Large text

system_object_types.name: validation_function
system_object_types.description: Validation function

system_object_types.title: Add supported_association_types attribute to system_object
system_object_types.description:
add system fields only on creation of object types that support link association

Use supported_association_types attribute as a source for association_type attribute of data_type field when a particular object type is used as data type

system_object_types.title: Add support for inline editing for table views
Add support for uplodable data sources e.g. Excel, CSV etc.
Add support for Data Harvesting Prevention
system_object_types.description: Add CAPTCHA human verification technology to search forms (smart queries) to prevent data harvesting bots from scraping data

system_object_types.title: Add Search Engine Optimimisation (SEO) support to pages
Add support for graphical visualisation e.g graphs, maps etc.
Add support for user activities analytics
system_object_types.description: Capture user activities and produce reports etc.

system_object_types.title: Add support for file and data caching with CDN (Content Delivery Network)
Add support for image data type
system_object_types.description: Add support for Image resizer that can be configured to create thumbnail or other custom uniformly-sized version of each uploaded image

system_object_types.title: Add support for Geocoding
system_object_types.description: Add latitude and longitude to data objects, so that data can be plotted on the map

system_object_types.title: Add support for one button press for reordering  item in lists
system_object_types.description: There should be only one button to move list items up and one to move them down

system_object_types.title: Add support for text sensitivity constraint for text fields
Add support for authentication with ID Services
system_object_types.description: Support Google, Twitter, Facebook, Hotmail (live), Open ID etc.

system_object_types.title: Add support for SAML Single Sign-On
system_object_types.description:
Support Active Directory, Azure AD, Salesforce, OneLogin, PingOne, and other SAML 2.0 ID providers

Implement internal SAML 2.0 ID provider to power internal Single Sign-On across multiple applications per account

system_object_types.title: Business value, complexity and priority are stored as integers (0) when no value is provided
Add support for Web/Mobile forms
system_object_types.description:
Embedded or via link etc.
Publicly accessible or with authentication
Email notifications
Invitations

system_object_types.title: Add support for Integration Plug-ins (e.g. MS Office, Wordpress, Magento etc)
Separate views from the pages
system_object_types.description: Add views as many links from a page object (or even a component object inside a container)

system_object_types.title: Display application name as the page title
Add support for dynamic creation of new objects for object properties of embed link association types
Remove page_size property from the view object type and objects
Add confirmation alert before deleting items
Add support for soft deletes
system_object_types.description:
Define at object type level if soft delete should be enforced for its instances 
If yes instances are soft deleted when delete command is invoked.

system_object_types.title: Make sure that data table gets back to it's original state after form modal is dismissed
system_object_types.description:
At the moment when a modal window is dismissed after creating a new object or modifying existing table goes back to the first page after it's reloaded.
make sure it goes to the last viewed page

system_object_types.title: Make sure that form modal window is not dismissed when pressing outside of it

commands.name: refresh

system_object_types.title: Refactor scope lookup source so that is doesn't need to be duplicated in each object type
Accordion of attributes does not render correctly when deleting one of the groups
system_object_types.description: When deleting accordion groups, that underlying array data is correct, but accordion shows wrong item details, while the header is correct
